remarks: Lattice translation of a meet.  TODO: change antecedent to ` K e. HL ` (Contributed by NM, 25-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnj.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrnj.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
ltrnj.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnj.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnj $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( F ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) .\/ ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
